message.raw:
Do not replace stdout and stderr with os.devnull if sys.stdout is not a tty, only
if it is None (Windows pythonw.exe Py3) or has a negative file descriptor
(Windows pythonw.exe Py2). This allows for the case where sys.stdout is a
zprocess output redirector, in which case we still want output.

Patch bump to 2.7.1 so BLACS can depend on this change for worker terminals.
